channel.title: Server question
channel.description: I made my 317 server i have a testscape source and moparscape dl client i alreasy compiled the files but when i try to press the runserver.bat it tells me 'JAVA' IS NOT RECONGIZED AS A INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL SOURCE, OPERATING PROGROM OR BATCH FILE

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @911_u_died 911 u died
item.description:
@911_u_died wrote:

i treid restarting computer and still says that problem and at client.java where do i change the ip and port

Read full topic

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

if its giving an error problem, go to client.java and change the port to 43594, and the ip address to 127.0.0.1, it should start up after that, you have to have a server to run it though

Read full topic

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

It’s supposed to say Usman was here, because I was here.
For the second part restart your computer, and then start runserver.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @911_u_died 911 u died
item.description:
@911_u_died wrote:

THANKS! that problem went away but now it says
USAM WAS HERE
UNABLE TO STARTUP LISTENER ON 43594- PORT ALREADY IN USE?

Read full topic

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Set your Paths and use this runserver.bat code:

@echo off title UsmanIsland echo Usman was here java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.7.0-ga-bin.jar server exit

Read full topic
